Articles.Content: I've only been playing for a week, and still couldn't figure out what this is:

You have no new messages...

Basically contract messages will go there, and it will alert you when a contract is completed.

Also: moving to Gameplay Questions.

Edited September 19, 2015 by sal_vager
this will happen when you wont delete completed contract notifications- other then that it's completely superfluous

I've only been playing for a week, and still couldn't figure out what this is:

http://i.imgur.com/Spbk0fV.png

What kind of gameplay are you doing? sandbox, science, or career?
Ah, I'm mostly in sandbox and just started science mode, haven't tried career mode yet.

Ah, I'm mostly in sandbox and just started science mode, haven't tried career mode yet.

If you decide to try Career Mode and find you are getting stuck, I have created a tutorial for beginners here.

IMO Science mode is a good way to learn the basics as you don't get swamped with parts early on and unlike Career, you don't have to worry about the costs. As mentioned, the mystery button only functions in career mode.

Welcome to KSP (hope you didn't plan on getting much else done? )

>Joined forums in 2011

Did you leave and come back?
